---------------------------
# Rescan
A modern port scanner for recon written in python

# Installation
- `pip install rescan`
- `rescan info` for more information

#  Debug Setup
- `git clone https://github.com/snowkluster/rescan.git`
- `python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt`

# Help
- `rescan --help`
